Reviews.Title: “Comfy beds and pillows!!”
Reviews.Author: KarenIG
Reviews.Content: Everything here was good for the price, but the beds are what stand out, quality pillow top mattresses that you usually only find in a more expensive hotel. When I sleep good I'm happy!! It is a 2 story hotel with no elevator, so if you cannot navigate the stairs, be sure to reserve a first floor room.

Reviews.Title: “Triple Queen Rooms!”
Reviews.Author: RussnPat7
Reviews.Content: When we're visiting Branson it's usually a family affair with kids, grandkids and friends. For the past several years, we've made Amazinn & Suites our stay of choice, and they've never disappointed. The facility is attractive and in good repair, the rooms are clean, beds are comfortable, and the staff is always friendly and helpful. Upstairs rooms are cheaper, so you can get exercise and save some money. And, the triple queen rooms are great when you need to put several folks in one room. Breakfast is fairly standard fare, with the addition of biscuits & gravy or french toast. We like this place!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Clean, Quiet Room”
Reviews.Author: knockoutrose
Reviews.Content: I like that it's located on The Shepard of the Hills Expressway making is easier to get in and out of the traffic. The room was clean, with Micro and Fridge, the bed was very comfortable, and the drapes shut out all the light. The b'fast is enough as it's not a restaurant, I didn't expect more. There is a restaurant across the street, and IHOP is about one block away should you want a larger B'fast. I did walk across the street for a more complete b'fast a couple of times. This was my second time to stay there as I like the price, room and location. Can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: “Comfy beds”
Reviews.Author: bigdogjake
Reviews.Content: The room we had had 3 beds that were very comfortable... very clean...plenty of hot water for showers...the pool was nice as well as the hot tub...the only problem we had was the wireless internet was pretty slow and could not keep a signal very long... but besides that hotel was very nice for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Poor management, unprofessional staff.”
Reviews.Author: Doug M
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel because they could accomadate my whole family of six in one room, upon arriving we find out they did not book our first night there, of course they were full so they tell us we would have to stay somewhere else that night. The desk attendent did call some places to see if they had vacancy. We explained to him that we would have to have two rooms or a more expensive suite and it would cost more for us to stay. I asked was there some way they could compesate us since they were the ones who made the mistake.He called his manager and she told him it would have to go to accounting the next day.The guy would not let me talk to the manager so we went next door where they were very friendly and helpful.The desk attendent had the nerve to ask me did I want him to cry me a river to show he did care.Very poor attitude.

Reviews.Title: “Clean room--comfortable bed--funny smell”
Reviews.Author: GottaTravelGottaGo
Reviews.Content: Our room was clean with plenty of towels and a very comfortable bed. However, it smelled like someone had been smoking in the room and then tried to clean/cover it up. Since it didn't give me a headache, we didn't worry about it. Usually cigarette smoke gives me a headache, so whatever was done to clean it, must have worked to some degree. You could hear sounds from other rooms--no voices though. We had a jetted tub in our room that was very nice. There were no shampoo or conditioner bottles. Instead there was a dispenser of some secret substance in the shower. This substance did not lather. There were decent hand soaps. The refrigerator was great. The breakfast was basic--cereals, toast, biscuits, bagels, donuts, boiled eggs, orange and apple juices. Overall, it was a good room with a good breakfast. We would definitely consider staying here again since it was walking distance to the show we were going to.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Budget friendly too!”
Reviews.Author: yensid65
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel off the internet not really sure of what we would be getting. It was AWESOME! Great location just off the main strip but easy to find and close to everything we needed. Rooms were VERY clean and comfortable. pillow top beds, mini-fridge and microwave, clean pool and friendly staff. Very affordable rates, plus we found out that they have larger rooms with 3 queen beds. When we come back with more family we can all stay together! We will DEFINITELY stay here again! Thank you SO much!

Reviews.Title: “Great budget motel”
Reviews.Author: turtlemom11
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this motel in June 2012 for our anniversary. The hotel had a quieter location just off the strip but still close to attractions such as the IMAX theater complex. The pool stays open later than most so that causes a bit more noise than at some hotels and motels but since we weren't right next to it I didn't find it a problem. Our room had newer furnishings and was on the second floor. I liked that the stair wells were covered and there were plenty of them to use. It was also nice that the upper and lower floors were all connected with walkways outside even though the hotel is many seperate smaller blocks or buildings of rooms. The only issue we found in our room was a small stain on and near the ceiling of the sink area. The only issue with the hotel at large is that you could not take your breakfast to your room and there wasn't enough seating even on a weekday. The mini-fridge and microwave were clean and in working order. The television was a large flat screen that would make most kids and husbands swoon with joy! This was also the first hotel that didn't cause my back to ache when we slept. We plan to return with our baby girl when she is old enough to enjoy the fun Branson and this little hotel has to offer.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: This was the second time we stayed at this motel. The room was clean, service very good, front desk pleasant & helpful. Breakfast was OK. Price was good. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: jeff k
Reviews.Content: This was a good value hotel with 3 queen beds. Since there were six of us this worked out perfect. Breakfast was good all four kids were happy and loved the french toast. The rooms with 3 queen beds appeared to all be in the back by the pool but only a minute and half walk or two at the most to the breakfast. Great location can get around the traffice jams with ease. We arrived early and they let us into our room early which was a plus. Beds are very soft I liked them, AC could run you out even being 100 deg's outside. It's not a five star but we will stay there next time we come.

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon Great”
Reviews.Author: saphbaby77
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were married at the end of March and decided on Branson for our Honeymoon. We opted to use Hotwire to book our Hotel. We were very pleased with the choice we made. This hotel had wonderful beds!! We were on the 2nd floor close to the soda machines. There was little noise where we were located. The rooms were super clean. They came in and cleaned our rooms every day while we were there. We slept late most mornings, so we never took advantage of the breakfast. The ONLY complaint we had was that we put the do not disturb sign on the door and housekeeping insisted on knocking on the door anyway. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Thanks for making our Honeymoon relaxing. :)

Reviews.Title: “My first (and last) stay here”
Reviews.Author: gpjb
Reviews.Content: A good value for a 3 queen bed suite. Unfortunately that's the only value. Our room was as far as possible from the office so we never made it to the breakfast in time to try it. The room was clean, but the carpet felt dirty so I always kept on shoes. My biggest complaint is that housekeeping didn't arrive to clean our room until late afternoon on the first day..okay, we were in and out, so no problem. The second day, however, we were gone from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. Arrived back to put little one down for nap and room still not clean. When I went to the office to request that housekeeping wait to clean our room till very late in the day when we would be leaving for shows, I was informed that housekeepers left at 4 p.m. and they offered to just give me a towel exchange. Basically, since they hadn't cleaned the room during the 5 hours I was out, either my room wouldn't get cleaned or the kiddo wouldn't get a nap - my choice! It is a great location, beds a bit too mushy soft for my taste, an adequate room but definitely no luxuries, doors open to the exterior so you do get some outside noise and if someone is on the sidewalk smoking, it comes in your a/c vent. A good choice for those who need a room to accomodate several people at a budget friendly price. I stayed here based on the favorable reviews online; I won't stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Second time and every bit as good at the first.”
Reviews.Author: Marie F
Reviews.Content: Wonderful value. Good rooms, beds, pillows, tv, programing, clean, breakfast, mini fridg and micro wave and very well located. Did I mention a wonderful value.

Reviews.Title: “clean”
Reviews.Author: hers6
Reviews.Content: clean, very good location, flat parking lot, quiet, nice breakfast, loved the hot tub and pillowtop mattresses.very comfortable!

Reviews.Title: “Favorite motel in branson”
Reviews.Author: Kcscag
Reviews.Content: Great rooms. Wonderful mattresses and pillows. Our first choice in lodging!

Reviews.Title: “Its just ok.”
Reviews.Author: Clayton333
Reviews.Content: First off this is not no ritz carlton! not as clean as a Hilton, buy cleaner than a sleep inn. the rooms really do need flat screens. there is not as many tables as there should be in the restaurant. VERY GOOD PILLOWS!

Reviews.Title: “Prayer Mountain Convention”
Reviews.Author: jdmisener
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean the whole trip. The staff was very helpful and ready to help make our stay perfect. They have a very nice breakfast every morning. Will be back in March

Reviews.Title: “Quick overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: AlwaysAMomFirst
Reviews.Content: Stayed in family suite for a quick one night stay during November. Spent all day at Silver Dollar City so we were only in room long enough to shower and sleep. Beds were softer than most you would find in an economy price room. Room had three queen beds and were clean. Pillows were not very firm and sheets came off at the corners during night. Room had microwave and single coffee pot. Shower clean but wallpaper was starting to peel a little from the moisture. I would stay here again for a quick sleepover. Breakfast was adequate with cereal, toast, french toast, bagels.. I think there was a few donuts earlier. Coffee was VERY weak. If you just need a clean place to sleep and shower it works.

Reviews.Title: “Amazinn isn't”
Reviews.Author: Pryncesse
Reviews.Content: The Amazinn was just average - not terribly clean, not terribly dirty, not the cheapest, but not the most expensive. The room was dark, and the furniture was okay. The bath had a musty smell, and they are not generous with towels. It took us two days to find the swimming pool. We had to ask for an iron and ironing board, and waited a day for them to find it. The continental breakfast was terrible - we got coffee and that was it. Good southern cooking at really reasonable prices is easily available in Branson, so look elsewhere for breakfast. Now for good stuff - the people were very nice, the price is right in the mid-range, and the location is convenient. We won't go again, however. We have stayed at much nicer places in Branson that are in the same price range. It is convenient to have a refrigerator and microwave in the room. And the best ice cream in Branson is right next door!!

Reviews.Title: “Always a good stay.......”
Reviews.Author: KatieScarlettO
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the AmazInn - again - twice in September, this time with my husband. This is a mid-quality hotel/motel - but the benefits make it my go to place to stay in Branson. And I go through about 4 times per year. It's old and even though it's claimed to be updated - it's really still old and old fashioned. But the prices are fabulous, the front desk staff is always friendly, accommodating, and very helpful. It's always clean. And since I'm always there in the off-season it's usually VERY quiet. Our first time through was just a normal stay and everything was great. Our second time through we requested to be given a room by noon - I was dropping my husband at the airport and after a week working on a rural cabin he NEEDED a shower before getting on the plane. The front desk was SO helpful and gave us a clean room with a noon check-in. We couldn't have been more grateful. And since I was staying the night before heading back to the cabin I took advantage of the laundry room and was so happy to have the microwave and fridge. I'm not a fan of hotel breakfast buffets - they are never healthy. And this is no exception. But since I had a micro/fridge and my own food I didn't need it. I know we'll be back in the spring! And will be looking forward to it.

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel, great value”
Reviews.Author: Bvegas1
Reviews.Content: We stayed here just 1 night while going to Silver Dollar City. Very clean, very basic room. The rooms are all exterior, and can be accessed easily by your vehicle. For the price, this fit the need really well. We'd definitely stay there again! One note: if you are picky about food, the continental breakfast wasn't the best; fruit wasn't really that fresh, the coffee was gross, and the choices were fairly limited. That said, it was free and therefore tough to pass up!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and affordable.”
Reviews.Author: Casey F
Reviews.Content: very clean hotel. great staff. this is a tourist town and it is very hard to find a smoking room. Amazinn and Suites was a great place to stay. they were very clean rooms and there staff is very nice. Easily accessible rooms. Even if you have an upstairs room it is not that bad getting your luggage in. If I had not only been passing through I would have stayed longer to visit the area.

Reviews.Title: “Family trip”
Reviews.Author: Brandy C
Reviews.Content: We just recently stayed 5 nights in this hotel...very nice and clean!! Staff is also very friendly & price was very reasonable!! We will definitly be back here!!!

Reviews.Title: “Satisfied Customer”
Reviews.Author: Joe M
Reviews.Content: Room was clean. Personal at desk were courteous and professional,

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding value, clean & quiet!”
Reviews.Author: asiapointriders
Reviews.Content: AmazInn Hotel and Suites offers everything you would find at twice the price with exception of an ironing board. Ha! Who uses an ironing board any more? I can bet, though, if you really need one those nice people at the front desk could round one up. We chose the "value double queen" on the second floor. For our less than $60 we got a 25" tv with 64 channels, microwave, fridge (large by motel standards!, includes small freezer area and 3 shelves plus triple levels of storage in door), solid wood luggage holder (vs those tv table types that fall down as soon as you put your luggage on top), two pillow top queen beds, a vanity/sink with coffee maker, and bath with extended round shower rod that makes the shower/tub feel much larger. I had read a review that no soaps were included, but our room had a tiny soap for the sink and a hair/body/face wash dispenser in the shower. Bring your own name brand, but this works in a pinch. The room was spacious! It comes with a small wooden "card" table which is perfect for eating take-out (don't you hate having to eat in bed??), working on your laptop with the free wifi, or, of course, playing cards. :-) There is a nice sized rack on the wall for hanging clothes; the hangers are not removable so you don't have to worry about the last guest walking off with them. There are three large storage drawers under the tv. The a/c unit is not as loud as some, but if you are a very light sleeper it might bother you a bit. With all there is to do in walking distance, though, you should be able to come home and pass out. The AmazInn is across the street from a craft mall, which has a lot of touristy junk, and the IMAX theater which also shows first run movies on a regular sized screen. The IMAX mall includes clothing, leather, and souvenir shops, a fudgery, a food court, and live music. You are also in walking distance to Red Lobster, Golden Corral, a hot dog/ice cream stand, and I think I saw a Taco Bell. You are off the strip with all its traffic congestion, but just a few blocks away. I've been coming to Branson for seven years; the AmazInn is my new top pick for a quick, clean, economical place to lay my head at night. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, convenient and economical”
Reviews.Author: Gary W
Reviews.Content: I've ben searching for a place where our large family could stay in one room. Thank you for the triple queen rooms. Very clean, convenient and economical.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Inn Review”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: This was our first time staying in Amazing Inn. We were really completely pleased. The Queen Size Beds were very comfortable, Clean and Very good Breakfast. We also like the refrigerator in the room. We will stay there again when we return to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Not fancy but clean”
Reviews.Author: SusanD442001
Reviews.Content: Bed was very comfortable. Breakfast consisted of toast, bagels (blueberry and plain), apple and orange juice, french toast, hard-boiled eggs, pre-packaged oatmeal, 4 kinds of cereal, milk, cut up fruit pieces, and donuts. It was enough to keep us full until lunchtime and better than most free breakfasts I've seen. Fridge and microwave in room was nice but didn't really use them-did unplug fridge after first night due to weird noise it made that kept waking us up. Bathroom definitely needed updating, must have spent the money on the bed which I'd take any day over a fancier bathroom. Tub did have jets in it but we didn't try that out. Traffic noise not a problem overnight and didn't wake us at all. Free internet in the room was good, remote control wasn't that great and would have liked more channels or satellite TV. Price was pretty fair but we would have to pay $30 more per night to be in fancier chain hotel. I would recommend this to anyone wanting a decent breakfast, quiet area away from the strip, and clean room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Pete D
Reviews.Content: The people at the desk were wonderful. Very friendly and helpful with information about about what to see and do in Branson. Room was large and clean. Beds were very comfortable. Microwave and fridge in room. Breakfasts were very good. Coffee is on all the time. Close to theaters and attractions. Very reasonable rates. If we go back to Branson, this is where I would stay.

Reviews.Title: “averageJohn”
Reviews.Author: John G
Reviews.Content: It was an inexpensive hotel with good service ,enough breakfast ,and good access to attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: grandmaDover_AR
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel. Rooms are big, has microwave and fridg in rooms. Breakfast is biscuits and gavey, cereal, juices, and cake donuts, nothing fancy, but enough to get you going for the day.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for a last minute booking”
Reviews.Author: anaccountofthemiddle
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here as a last minute decision. The staff was helpful and friendly and the room was clean. There was a microwave, fridge, coffee pot, and hairdryer in the room but no iron or ironing board. There is a free breakfast but in all honesty it's a little skimpy, basically just donuts and cereal. However I will say that what they did have was laid out nicely. It's a little off the beaten path so traffic isn't bad and neither is the noise, but it's still very close to everything. All things considered it wasn't a bad place to stay and we would definately consider going back.

Reviews.Title: “Great place especially for the price”
Reviews.Author: mpar0
Reviews.Content: We'll stay here again! The room was nice size and very clean. The bed was comfortable. We asked at the desk about internet pricing and the very helpful clerk pointed to the computer in the lobby. She said we could get a better rate online than she could give us. She was right. They have a nice pool and hot tub area. Again, very clean and well kept. The location is very good, easy to get in and out. We checked out the breakfast but did not eat there. It is the usual carbfest that all hotels have. All in all, a great place to stay. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “OK Stay, But Probably Wont Come Back.”
Reviews.Author: doscervesasporfavor
Reviews.Content: Husband and I took a trip to Branson on a whim. In my last minute search for the best deal I came upon Amazinn Inn. It is conveniently right off of the busy strip, which is what we liked the most about it. They had a good promo price online so we booked it. Upon arrival we submitted our AAA membership card because they offered discounts for AAA members. We were told that since we got the best rate possible that they could not give us our AAA discount. I mentioned that we signed the guest book online, which offered a discount for doing, and requested that discount to be accounted for. Apparently if you sign the guest book AFTER you have made the reservation online the discount is not valid until your next stay. We are not overly frugal by any means, but a discount is a discount. We could have stayed anywhere in Branson, believe me they have hundreds of places to choose from, I think this hotel has lost sight of that. Besides lack of customer service the staff surprisingly didn't know anything about Branson. We talked to both clerks at the from desk and asked about best shows, best restaurants, best attractions, etc. Neither of them could suggest anything except for a steakhouse down the road that usually has a lot of cars in the parking lot. They gave us some brochures and wished us the best of luck. (Thank God for Trip Advisor, we got on our iPads and found the best of everything in Branson!) We went to our room, without our discount, and found it to be clean. The room decor is outdated, but the bed was very comfy. Beware of the description of the size of the beds. We supposedly had double queens in our room, They were more like glorified twin beds. The mini fridge kept all of our perishables and beverages cold. The coffee maker is one of those "one cup at a time" types. The pool is small, but it was clean. Pool could use a couple of more lounge chairs. We did not eat the free breakfast that was offered. We went down one morning to check it out. The staff was scrambling to keep up with the hungry patrons. They couldn't refill the food fast enough and people were waiting so we went out for breakfast both mornings. All in all the place is clean and inexpensive. If you are on a tight budget this place is reasonable, but don't expect additional discounts, a knowledgeable staff, or excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: “Randy is the greatest!”
Reviews.Author: Melanie M
Reviews.Content: We had a great weekend. We went up for the car show. Hotel was great and clean. The people that work there went out of their way to help us out! We will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible stay”
Reviews.Author: cbs55
Reviews.Content: Refrigerator made noises like a coffee pot-not fixed called front desk guy said what do you want me to do? Bed not made right, top sheet not tucked in at bottom. Breakfast was rubber eggs & stale toast. Manager wouldn't fix our bill-worse stay in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: SandyMcLeansboro_IL
Reviews.Content: We can't say enough good things about this place. Front desk was very friendly and helpful. The pool was wonderful. Rooms were spacious, bed was very comfortable and the housekeeping was wonderful to help. The breakfast was very good and they were very good about keeping enough for everyone. We would defintely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, would stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: ladyliz1417
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean. Beds were VERY comfortable. Nice pool. People at the desk were friendly and helpful. The only thing that would have made it better is if they had make your own waffles on the continental breakfast. All in all, a good place to stay at a reasonaable price. Easy to find as well.

Reviews.Title: “location,room,bed was great; would STAY again!”
Reviews.Author: tproctor777
Reviews.Content: this was my first time to stay at AmazINN in Branson. I ordered the reservation by telephone and received a great rate, considering it was July (high season). We were in Branson on business and because of the excessive late hours that I was on the computer, I was treated very curteous in the a.m. hours, not to be disturbed. I would highly recommend AmazINN whether it be for business or pleasure. I did not rate "room service" since I never had the opportunity to use their service.

Reviews.Title: “OUTSTANDING!”
Reviews.Author: dwade17
Reviews.Content: Very clean and quiet!!! They have pillowtop mattresses so the beds are great! The staff is extremely friendly and helpful! Their continental breakfast is large and they have a good selection. We won't stay anywhere else in Branson, Mo!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great, comfortable, convenient, would absolutely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: USRoadTripper
Reviews.Content: All the great reviews of this hotel are true! This hotel was in a very convenient location, and the outside and parking lot were well kept. The room was quite large, and the bathroom was great, with good water pressure and a nice shower head. The bed was pillow top and SO comfortable! Better than rooms I have paid $150 for! The room came with a microwave and fridge, which was nice. The pool area was also very well kept and appealing, though I didn't swim myself. I was exceptionally pleased with this hotel, and would DEFINITELY stay there again if I were to return to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Nice rest”
Reviews.Author: jdmisener
Reviews.Content: We took a trip to drop off our niece. The service was great and a nice peacefull spot to rest. The beds are very comfortable and the breakfast was great. The staff was so helpfull even James the maintaince man asked if there was anything we needed.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I thought......”
Reviews.Author: JDMDFamilyTime
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews on AmazInn I was excited to book our rooms and cancel the rooms I had already booked with another hotel. When we got there, the front desk was very helpful and gave us some great information. So when we got to our room, I wasn't very happy. The smell in the room was TERRIBLE!! it smelt like bad body odor! We decided to stay and used some air freshener. The next morning we went to the free breakfast, nothing was left and it was only 8:30 am. There was a little ceral, no fresh fruit, the eggs didn't even look real some type of patty and one gallon jug of milk that was empty. The place was a mess! Needless to stay we went up the street every day that we were there to the IHOP. Money I didn't plan on spending. The next couple of days we would head back to the hotel from our day of activities and people would be sitting outside in the chairs out of their room smoking and make lots of noise. Made you feel a little unsafe and not very classy. Lastly, my husband found several bugs in our room. It was gross! We had had enough and was thankful that was our last night there. We went straight home and washed everything we owned that was in that room. Everyone has said that the beds are so comfortable, yes the are, but the rest of it isn't worth the comfy bed. We will not be goin back to this place again. I do not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff! Safe and quiet location.”
Reviews.Author: Evanw2911
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very nice to come to for our honeymoon...however, we reserved a jacuzzi room through expedia thinking it would be like the pictures but it wasn't. The "jacuzzi" was 4 little jets in a regular bathtub...not a large jetted tub in the main room. Not as romantic as we expected but the staff was very nice. Both checkin and checkout were simple and harmless. the location was far from most branson attractions but it was perfect if you wanted to go to silver dollar city.

Reviews.Title: “2nd time to stay here and will be back for 3rd.”
Reviews.Author: marm0
Reviews.Content: Did not need to shop around for a motel in Branson. We had stayed here last October and we were very pleased with the accommodations. So, we made reservations again this year. Once again, we were very satisfied with our stay at AmazeInn. Clean rooms, friendly service, great location all add up to a motel we plan to use every time we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “We were very pleased with our room but breakfast was terrible.”
Reviews.Author: JessnDeb
Reviews.Content: The first thing we noticed was how CLEAN everything was. The queen pillow top beds were very nice and comfortable. The water pressure was great for taking showers. Parking was easy. Breakfast was very disappointing though. One morning it consisted of hard french bread, scrambled eggs that were shaped into tiny looking pancakes and leather like to eat, generic cereals, bananas that had the ends cut off and had turned black, donuts, coffee, juices. The second morning they had biscuits and gravy instead of the eggs. No meat. We liked our room so much we would definitely stay there again, despite their breakfast. We paid $67 nightly. For last minute booking in July, that wasn't bad at all.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was very clean and comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: lilly47883
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed staying at the Amazinn in Branson. My kids are older now and it is hard to find a place to stay where everyone has a comfortable place to sleep. The room with 3 queen beds was perfect for our family. The hotel was very clean and the rooms were spacious. The breakfast was great too. They offered cereal and milk but they also has fruit, eggs, bagels and juice. Our family will be looking forward to staying at Amazinn again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Branson for the price!”
Reviews.Author: PrettynPink1976
Reviews.Content: The most comfortable beds we have ever had in a hotel. It was rainy one day..and we didn't even want to get up and around..we were so comfortable. The rooms are more spacious than other hotels, so you don't feel as confined. The rooms were quiet, you couldn't hear babies crying or conversations from other rooms. The area was great. Off the strip, but so close it was no problem getting there, the location also allowed both left and right turns, no issues with traffic making it difficult to head in any direction. The staff was very nice, Luis was very helpful. Definitely going to stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “A nice place for the money......”
Reviews.Author: KatieScarlettO
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the sister property - The Angel Inn - also in Branson. On this particular trip through I decided to try the AmazInn. It's actually a bit nicer - it feels fresher, newer, and cleaner - while also providing good beds, a clean room, and a fridge and microwave, and a lot of space to move around. One of the downsides of these types of rooms is the exterior entrance and the cement walkway from the stairs to the rooms. I was put in a room right at the stairs - so I heard every person who came and went including every rolling suitcase and running child. I'd recommend asking for a room at the far end where no one walks past you. The AmazInn isalso quite removed from most anything and everything that I planned to do while in town. Whereas The Angel Inn is kind of in the heart of lots of stuff. Next trip through it will be a tough call to choose - location or fresher, cleaner room. Overall I like both places and am happy to stay at either again. They are basic but provide a great value.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean, spacious”
Reviews.Author: My1Voice
Reviews.Content: This motel was in a very convenient location & not on the main drag. Never had problems getting in or out. Rooms were spacious & clean with microwave & fridge no extras such as shampoo or lotion, etc though. We stayed in a double queen room lower level. Room was out dated & needed slight repairs (wallpaper peeling from walls, stained tub from age) nothing unreasonable though. Still was clean & comfortable. Breakfast could be improved was cold & just warmed up in microwave it seemed. Staff was friendly though & check in was fairly quick. For the price & location would be willing to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and quality accomodations”
Reviews.Author: Tom-Bonnie1212
Reviews.Content: Our room was well maintained and quite large. We made good use of the refrigerator and microwave. Easy parking and travel to the many shows. Also, the room was a good value for mid-week.

Reviews.Title: “VERY pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: utexonah
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 nights, and were surprised to be very pleased with the accommodations. The rooms were clean and fairly spacious. They had a fridge and microwave. The beds were VERY comfortable pillow-tops. It is a huge complex consisting of several buildings. Though updated, overall the property is old and a little rough around the edges. The flooring in our bathroom was a little bubbled. They provide a bar of soap for the sink, but a liquid soap dispenser for both soap and shampoo. The pool was still closed for the season. The quality of the breakfast fluctuated. We went to breakfast both days during the last hour--on one day there was very little food left, the other day there was plenty. They make an attempt to provide a hot breakfast. In addition to the standard cereal and bread, they had sausage and biscuits (not great-the biscuits were hard) one day and french toast and egg patties the other day. The hotel is located a little way off the main strip--this is both good (quieter, less traffic) and bad (not as much stuff within walking distance).

Reviews.Title: “Great visit”
Reviews.Author: rsmith246
Reviews.Content: Enjyed trip to Branson, Only got to stay overnight because of family obligations. Saw Mickey Gilley, awesome show. Always eat at Golden Corral, delicious food. Love to visit Branson. Have been there for several years, will go again. Clay Cooper show is great,

Reviews.Title: “Hands down, the Best hotel in Branson!!!!”
Reviews.Author: livetotravel1243455
Reviews.Content: The rooms were large, spacious, and excepionally clean. The beds were better than I have in my own home! The staff was very friendly and super helpful!!! The name simply puts it, this hotel is Amazing!!!

Reviews.Title: “Much better than I hoped!”
Reviews.Author: maccogirl
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel through Hotwire, and I was pleasantly surprised. The rooms were extra large, having room for two queen beds plus a table--and lots of extra room. We had a microwave and refrigerator. The beds and pillows were great, and the breakfast was enough to start you for the day. It was definitely quiet at night. We were surprised to find so many were there! I go to Branson a great deal, and this would be one place I will definitely tell others about. I only paid $33 on Hotwire.

Reviews.Title: “Roomy, CLEAN, comfortable accomadations; more than you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: 4meowsers
Reviews.Content: We got so much for what we paid for at this hotel. The rooms were the cleanest we've ever stayed in. The carpet was new and the room had a new carpet smell, like it was recently installed. We rented 2 rooms and both had a refrig & microwave, newer models. The beds were the most comfortable "away from home" beds we've slept in, ever. We usually wake up with at least one of the 4 of us with a backache but not here. Since there's no indoor pool at this locations they offer indoor pools at their 2 local sister-hotels.Breakfast had plenty of choices, always fresh coffee, kids loved the doughnuts (freshest we've ever had), fruits, hot & cold cereals. toast, french toast, bagels. I've had better with more choices other places and less and much worse yet other places and we weren't there b/c of breakfast. If they gave us anything to eat I was satisfied. The hotel business is very competitive in Branson with so many, many choices but the AmazInn has an edge with their spacious, clean rooms, comfortable beds, and bargain price. Nothing to complain about here! If so, then go to the Hyatt! It was really amazing at the AmazInn.

Reviews.Title: “Branson's Heaven”
Reviews.Author: lcrs2011
Reviews.Content: This was the most unexpected stay . I booked this trip online without seeing the hotel i let my partner choose the place. When he told me the great price i expected a DIVE! I was soooooooo wrong!! This is a well maintained, comfortable, courteous hotel. It is located in the best spot to have access to all Branson has to offer!!! Thanks to the staff for a GREAT 1st but not last trip to your beautiful establishment. LC&RS

Reviews.Title: “Peacefull and friendly time”
Reviews.Author: jdmisener
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff was very friendly and helpfull. Housekepping was ok. There could have been a more uniformed time for cleaning the room. There was always a fresh breakfast waiting. It was very good. The hotel was in a great location for getting to everything, and not on the busy strip. I would highly encourage anyone that wants a peaceful place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay! clean, soft beds and great pool indoors!”
Reviews.Author: papa-oklahoma
Reviews.Content: Took grandchildren to Branson, this motel was right off main drag but close to attractions. Quiet, soft beds clean rooms, curtious staff, great breakfast and pool that we had a hard time getting the grandkids out of. This was our first stay here and I think from now on when we go to Branson we will be booking with Angel Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: romeoangel
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in many hotels in Branson. This hotel (especially for the price) was a nice, clean, and comfortable place to stay. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the money.”
Reviews.Author: Miller78
Reviews.Content: The location is just off the strip and is nice and quiet. Pillow top beds in the rooms provide ultimate comfort. The rooms are very nice and clean and everyone is really friendly.

Reviews.Title: “AmazInn was an awesome place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: MawmawCran
Reviews.Content: Our group was treated wonderfully even though we were a small group. Accommodations were very clean & comfortable. The staff went out of their way to make sure we knew where we were going & the easiest way to get there! We loved staying with you!

Reviews.Title: “Not so amazing.”
Reviews.Author: woodsdwellers
Reviews.Content: We were booked into The AmazInn by the the Branson Tourism Center. If this room had not been part of a package we would have checked out the first night. The room had a bad odor that was very strong...almost caustic. The extended continental breakfast must refer only to the length of time served and not the selection as the food was inedible, what there was of it. Ours ended up in the trash can. We ate breakfast elsewhere each day. The location is good but the overall room is just barely average. It is large but the amenities are minimal. One ice machine serves the entire motel and it is far down the complex next to the pool. The sheets on the bed were clean and crisp but the blankets had obviously NOT been changed from the last guests...not the bedspread I'm talking about here...the actual blanket. The bed was fairly comfortable with a pillow top. Housekeeping otherwise was good. We will not return to the AmazInn, nor will we recommend it. FYI: Branson Tourism Center did a great job with our tickets and did not charge any fees. They just really dropped the ball on our lodging.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel I've stay at in Branson”
Reviews.Author: mscountryedge
Reviews.Content: Great location to walk to places,Extra friendly staff,breakfast was great,Beds are very comfortable and the rooms are very clean.Will be staying with angel inn next time i'm in town.

Reviews.Title: “AmazINN & Suites a great value”
Reviews.Author: Flower062
Reviews.Content: My husband and I arrived at the AmazINN for our planned week in Branson. We were greeted by a smiling friendly front desk. We checked into our room and found that the heat pump made a squeaky noise. I called the front desk and they immediately changed us to a different room. The rooms are very clean and larger than most in Branson. Also included is a fridg and micro wave. A plus for Branson is the level parking lot. The pillow top beds are very high and you almost have to jump into bed. Not very good for seniors. The place is very quiet. There is a ice cream palor. In the parking lot next to the hotel. Which stayed open after the last show. So that was nice to finish off our evening. My only negative is the last day we were there. They ran out of pillow cases when they changed the bed. So the boy who cleans the room just left us with no cases. When I called the front desk the women on duty at that time. Said I could stop by the office and pick one up. I did want a pillow case. When I went to the office. She was not very pleasant about giving me two pillow cases. One for each pillow. She said "if that didn't make me happy, she wouldn't know what to tell me".

Reviews.Title: “King Jacuzzi Room Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: BSimplyCreative
Reviews.Content: The King Jacuzzi Room we stayed in was very clean and they left you plenty of towels for bathing and using the jacuzzi. The front desk staff was very helpful in assisting you to locate places you wanted to visit. The location was very central to everything we wanted to do.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: mikeandsue2
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights. The beds were wonderful. The breakfast was fantastic. The staff was so welcoming and friendly. Our rooms were cleaned daily. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: pabrewer31
Reviews.Content: The stay was great, the rooms very clean, and the motel employees were considerate. The only thing was that the contenental breakfast was not quite up to par. I will certainly consider staying at the AmazInn on my next trip to Branson, which will not te too long in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, comfy beds”
Reviews.Author: NatureLoverMOM
Reviews.Content: High rating for value and pillowtop beds. I have stayed in hotels for over 1000 nights for business travel over the years. The bed in this room was more comfortable than most hotels that cost twice or even three times as much. The rooms are simple and all are exterior access. Room is clean and everything works, including a fridge and microwave. Climate control is fairly new, quiet and in good working order. This is a great place to rest after a busy day in Branson, especially if you are searching for an inexpensive hotel. My room had two queen beds, TV with hutch, luggage rack, 3' square table with 2 chairs, basic bathroom, and adequate lighting. The room is a lot like you would find in an older-generation Holiday Inn (except the beds are NICE and the carpets are clean at this hotel). It is obvious that the owner and staff of this hotel want to provide a clean, comfortable, inexpensive place to stay. Great job!

Reviews.Title: “Good time, very nice staff”
Reviews.Author: Splashofcolor
Reviews.Content: Very nice staff, great value and great location. Very comfortable beds. Overall we had a good time.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay, good price”
Reviews.Author: micotex
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very clean and the complex quiet. Good location off the main strip but easily accessible to the attractions. We asked for 1st floor room since we had an infant (and lots of baby equipment) but they charged $15 extra for that. The receptionist said it was a "hot breakast", but the only things that were hot were the biscuits and gravy, otherwise it's a continental breakfast. The wireless internet signal was fair, definitely not "high speed", but we were in the back of the complex.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was the best for the buck!”
Reviews.Author: 73010charlie
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife,with our 15 month old grandson had a wonderful stay. The staff worked with us in every way. The rooms where very clean and spacious.We will be back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice place to stay at a reasonable rate”
Reviews.Author: WileyG
Reviews.Content: Stayed in Branson on the recommendation of a friend at this hotel and really enjoyed the stay. Room was nice, it was quiet, and the pool was still open after Labor Day and it was nice too. The breakfast was OK, I've had better and I've had worse. My wife and I really enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, clean room, comfortable beds, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Maggie64850
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here 2 weekends in a row because we were impressed on our 1st visit. The first visit we had our 2 granddaughters with us, ages 6 and , the 2nd visit was just the 2 of us. On both visits, the rooms were clean, the beds were comfortable, the staff was friendly, and the prices were reasonable. Our rooms included a microwave and refrigerator. I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A great stay.”
Reviews.Author: barbvann
Reviews.Content: We just returned from our annual trip to Branson. Each time staying at a different hotel. This year we found a great place. I don't know what all the fuss was about on previous reviews regarding the 'odour' in the rooms. All rooms/hotels have their own smell of cleaning fluids or deodarizing. I believe this to be all it was. We were at the hotel for 5 nights and enjoyed our stay. The staff were friendly, the breakfast was great and rooms clean, and the beds are comfortable, ... come and enjoy your stay at this fine hotel. Oh yes, we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful time.”
Reviews.Author: greatlinda
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the stay at the Angel Inn. Very nice location. Nice breakfast every morning. Well kept up pool. Our room was nice and clean and all staff was very nice and seemed to care about our stay and comfort.

Reviews.Title: “The AmazInn was Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Southeast_Missourian
Reviews.Content: The Amazinn is #1 in our book. We've stayed in many different motels in Branson, but this motel was the best. The room was very large. The beds were comfortable, and the pillows were fantastic. The staff was friendly and very helpful. We have nothing negative to say about our experience. It was a quiet, relaxing weekend. We plan here again during our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “I felt like a Angel, I slept like one.”
Reviews.Author: Snowlady1948
Reviews.Content: It was a great time there. The hotel is close to everything.I will be glad to stay there again. The pillows are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Never had a bad experience after many stays there.”
Reviews.Author: steveCanton_Mo
Reviews.Content: Very clean. Staff is very helpful. Quiet and safe place to stay. Location is great. Best value for the money that we have found in Branson. We have stayed there many times and have not had any complaints!

Reviews.Title: “The place to stay: super clean,convenient, and quiet.”
Reviews.Author: oldkowgirl
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Close to everything you could possibly want or need.

Reviews.Title: “Very accommodating staff”
Reviews.Author: pamswd
Reviews.Content: Rooms are larger than most other hotels. The staff was very accommodating to our needs. Clean rooms. Easy walk to restaurants, shows, etc. Great location.

Reviews.Title: “Clean comfortable rooms and beds!! Family friendly and friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: Dummie01
Reviews.Content: We stayed over the holiday weekend with two grade school age children. The kids loved the pool and hot tub. The free breakfasts were great, we enjoyed the hot food. We loved the larger sized rooms and the beds were so comfortable. The hotel was pretty full, but quiet. It is located close to so many activities, and just off the strip. We certainly would stay their again, and would reccommend to family and friends. Sheila Topeka, Kansas

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place, outstanding friendly staff, clean rooms, great value!!!”
Reviews.Author: tammymetzgar
Reviews.Content: You could not find a better and more reasonably priced place to stay! It was clean and the beds were comfortable. Miss Becky was so helpful and nice she was the best!! The breakfast was pretty good. There is a coffee bar that has the best coffee I have ever had out of a large coffee maker. Very comfortable pillow top mattresses. The housekeeping staff was so nice and helpful. The location was very convenient to everything without being on the main drag. They also have a nice pool and hot tub that my boys loved. We stayed 5 days and it was really the best part of our trip! I will stay there every time I go to Branson! The Metzgars :)

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel in Branson and on earth!”
Reviews.Author: OzarkGriff
Reviews.Content: If you manage to get through the staff of the front desk and FINALLY get a room, be prepared to be assaulted by the smell of body odor. The staff is absolutely not concerned with what you have to say. They are rude, and preoccupied. The rooms absolutely stink! Not just a mild odor you can air out and overlook, but an a full frontal assault of nauseating measures. Then the mini-fridge must have been on the quits because it would start and stop all night if you have the slightest possible notion of trying to sleep. Finally, the ground floor rooms were infested with ants. When my daughter turned the light on over the sink in the middle of the night, the entire countertop was crawling. We tried to change rooms, they wouldn't apologize or make things work, so we left. Left quickly and never looked back. You'd have to be insane to stay here. Do yourself a favor and find somplace else or you'll be highly disappointed. This place stinks, and is an infested mess.

Reviews.Title: “AmazInn & Suites was Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Traveler_princess
Reviews.Content: This is our second year to stay at the AmazInn. The comfort of the beds is incredible. We chose the family room for our daughters & granddaughter. Microwave, fridge and ample room to move around. Rooms are very clean, good location and the staff are top of the line! We will definitely return to AmazInn & Suites for our next stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very happy...will return!!”
Reviews.Author: janiesnieder
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 5night stay at the AmazInn in Branson. I was leery at first because I have stayed at other hotels in Branson that are affordable that ended up being miserable. We were extremely satisfied with Amazinn. The location is perfect, off the main strip but not far, close to Silver Dollar City road. The beds are so comfortable, we all slept like a rock. The breakfast was more than enough. The pool was used a lot by us as the temps were high and they even extended the hours to midnight due to the hot days. Friendly staff and nice size rooms. Will return next time we are in Branson!!!

Reviews.Title: “Worried for nothing....great stay!”
Reviews.Author: junefour
Reviews.Content: What a great stay! We booked via Hotwire and after I paid the monies we were notified of the hotel we had booked and I was concerned that we had wasted our money. I should not have worried. We were greeted at check in and given directions to find the best route to our shows and destinations. Our room was clean, and despite the need for decor updating we really had a very nice stay. The beds were comfortable; they have a fridge and microwave in the room. The breakfast area gets crowded but the staff is very good about replenishing breakfast items and change what is served each day. It is a family centered place, the pool is smaller and it is an older place but we were more than satisfied. The kids enjoyed the ice cream each evening that is open after the shows. They are missing their root beer floats tonight. Tips: Shows to see with teens. Island Fire and The Legend of Kung Fu; both were spectacular! My boys really enjoyed them. The Veterans Museum is fabulous! They have some of the best exhibits we have ever seen under one roof. We also enjoyed a great meal on the deck overlooking the water at The Fish House by Bass Pro shop on the Landing.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, very well maintained hotel!”
Reviews.Author: traveller60090
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the cleanest I'd ever seen and in an excellent location!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, Great Location, Great Access to Bypass Roads”
Reviews.Author: jkc0llins
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay, slept well on comfortable new mattresses, and appreciated the hot breakfast every morning. The Angel Inn's location was central to all our activities. We were close to the bypass roads which made it so easy to get around by avoiding the bumper to bumper traffic on Hwy 76 "The Strip". We'll stay there again next time we're in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “A nice vacation getaway.”
Reviews.Author: mesadragon
Reviews.Content: Today is checkout day at the AmazINN and it was an excelent experience. I am very happy with this hotel it was very clean and not too expensive. The free breakfast was good and saved us money through the day. We purchased a Silver Dollar City and room package with this hotel and are very happy with the whole overall experience. The housekeepers had taken the childrens stuffed animals and staged them on the bed making them feel at home while we were gone which made the children very happy they really go the extra step her, I highly recomend.

Reviews.Title: “Thought our vacation was ruined, but the AmazInn made it wonderful!!!”
Reviews.Author: RNteacher9
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay here. The rooms are nice size, with really comfortable beds and pillows. My husband and I came to Branson and brought our 7 month old grandson. We had plenty of room even with a pack and play set up between the beds. Really nice to have a micro and fridge so we could bring pop to room and not have to load the baby up everytime we wanted a soft drink. The continetal breakfast was nice; would like to have had a couple of choices of hot food each day, but it worked well for us. Make sure to bring your own soap and shampoo; only one small bar and a dispenser in the shower. The pool was nice and clean, and not over crowded. We enjoyed being able to play in the pool with our grandson. Overall, I highly recommend this motel and we will definitely stay there again when we are in Branson. The staff was all very nice and extremely helpful, as we had a BAD experience down the street to start our vacation off. The cleaning lady was very accomodating as we had to come back to the motel and feed the baby while she was cleaning the room.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, spacious and would reccomend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Reneew77
Reviews.Content: Got there a little earlier than check in time, our room wasnt ready so they moved us to a different room so we didn't have to wait. The rooms were Clean, and roomy, the beds were comfortable, it had in room coffee, microwave and fridge. They had a free hot breakfast. We never used this though since we didn't get up early enough it was only until 9:30 am. Has an outdoor pool and hot tub. The staff was friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: crl1807
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful motel situated in the perfect place, on Shepard of the Hills Drive. We saw 4 fantastic shows without having to travel along the congested main thoroughfare. The people were friendly and helpful. As a matter of fact, we were resting and got a call from the office. They had tickets for the Andy Williams theater which they were going to give us for free. We already had tickets for the evening but what a kind gesture. Vacationing at Amazinn was a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “nice place and in a good location to many things”
Reviews.Author: dnascar44
Reviews.Content: We Were Staying At The Motel Next door But It Did Not Have Fridge or Micro, so afterOne Night We Went Next Door To The Amazinn & Suites and Stayed Three More Nights. We Are Coffee Drinkers so when I Asked For More Coffee and Creamers I Got Plenty More. When We Go To Branson Next Year This Is Where We Will Stay.

Reviews.Title: “Go somewhere else !”
Reviews.Author: KelleyJones_OK
Reviews.Content: We stayed here because of a "free mini vacation" . So, this hotel was chosen for us. We were early but were told we could not check in until exactly 3:00. When we did, the room stunk like BO. We went and bought air freshner ! The fridge was dirty too. did not use that. The vending machines were broken. After son swam I hung his shirt on balcony to dry instead of dripping in room. A staff member came by and took it. Both days the breakfast was empty by the time we got there . One morning we were there at 7:00 AM . did not eat there ! To top it all off, when we checked out, they would not verify our stay so that we could get reimbursed for our "free mini vacation" Ended up paying for a lousy hotel !! Go somewhere else !!

Reviews.Title: “VERY COMFORTABLE”
Reviews.Author: magic101072
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at the Amazinn & Suites so many times. We just keep coming back. Nice and clean. The beds are Amazin for a good nights sleep. Quiet too. We have taken the grandkids and they enjoyed the pool. Great that each room now has their own microwave and refrigerator for snacks and drinks.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, very comfortable room, good service!”
Reviews.Author: WTBandJB
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with our accommodations at AmazINN & Suites. The room was ready for us when we arrived and we were checked in promptly. Our room was clean and roomy and the pillow top beds were very comfortable. While the selection of items for breakfast was somewhat limited, the food was tasty and the staff made sure that there were no shortages and that the area was kept clean. Different items were offered from one day to the next. The staff was friendly both when we checked in and checked out and when we visited the lobby. We liked having coffee, tea, or hot chocolate available anytime. We would both recommend AmazINN & Suites to others and would choose to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: lirpaco
Reviews.Content: The location was excellent and close to attractions. The room was spacious and very clean and everyday we had clean towels. The continental breakfast was really good and a variety of items to chose from. The workers were very nice and helpful when we had questions. I would definately stay here again if we ever return to Branson,

Reviews.Title: “Thank you”
Reviews.Author: MustangVic
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn. It was conveniently located just off the strip, (so it was quiet) and behind WalMart and the local grocery store (in case we needed anthing). The rooms were clean. The staff was friendly. The pool room was clean and warm. The breakfast was different both days and both tasted great. Nice large selection for breaskfast items. Thank you for a terrific stay at your place. Now if you could only get Silver Dollar City to be as nice!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not so Amazinn & suites...”
Reviews.Author: cbbailey
Reviews.Content: If I hadn't gotten the room way below listed price I would probably be requesting some form of refund. The first night was miserable. The AC wouldn't stay on and the room was sweltering. I had to get up turn it off wait a bit then turn it back on for it to work. Then repeat every 30 minutes. They did seem to fix it for the second night, but it wasn't cold enough for my liking. The rooms were decent, smelled very strong of cleaner, I couldn't help but wonder if they were covering something up with the cleaner smell? Pool wasn't opened yet, but that was due to still being early spring. But they did have a decent hot tub, but it had a lot of dead bugs floating around and dirt in the seats. The free "high-speed" internet wasn't very high-speed, either. I guess I might be picky though when I am putting out money for a hotel. I didn't specifically choose this hotel, I booked it through hotwire, where you don't get to choose your hotel just the star rating.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: MaggieMO_10
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Room was very clean, spacious and comfortable. Priced right. Employees very friendly. Wouldn't change a thing. When we checked out, the clerk asked if there was anything about the room that they needed to know about that might need repair. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely Worth the Price”
Reviews.Author: jkstarks
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel with brand new pillow-top queen beds and it smelled clean. We traveled as a family of 5 and fit just fine. It's within walking distance of several restaurants and lots of shops. There is a huge craft mall right across the street. The location is just off Hwy 76 which is nice to be out of the "major traffice" area. We didn't need any assistance as we only stayed one night so I am not sure how the staff was. It is only about 4 miles from Silver Dollar City. I think if you're looking for a budget hotel, this is the place. We will definitely stay here again. I booked my reservations online through a Branson website and chose to stay upstairs because it was cheaper (about $45 w/tax). That was about $5 cheaper than using Expedia or the hotel itself.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: SammyGirl
Reviews.Content: My sister and I stayed at this hotel, and we were very happy with it. The room was very clean and good sized with two queen beds and a small table and 2 chairs. The beds are very comfortable, there was a mini fridge and a microwave in the room. The hotel was very quiet, we never heard any noise from any other guests. We also thought the location was good, close to the outlet mall! The staff were all nice and friendly. We did not think too much of the breakfast, not too much to pick from. Went down at 8:40am and nothing really left. But was not that big of a deal for us, especially since the hotel rate is really a bargain. We will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great BEDS!!”
Reviews.Author: rooster1944
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay at this motel and enjoyed the comfortable beds. It was clean and we got very good rates on the internet

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: airlinefamily36
Reviews.Content: We reserved this hotel through Hotwire. We stayed 4 nights in a non-smoking room with two double beds (2 adults and two kids). Overall the hotel room was clean, quiet, beds were comfortable, and it appeared newly decorated. We usually stay in Hampton Inns/Fairfield Inns, and this hotel was very competitive but nightly rate was much less. You don’t get the little shampoo bottles like some of the other hotels and the free continental breakfast was a little less robust than a Hampton or Fairfield, but we are talking rates that are ½ the amount. One slight negative was the bathroom: It was small, shower tub was a bit worn (had soap dispenser, but there was also bar soap available), and the floor tile was a drab brown color. The hotel also has outdoor corridors. Our two kids wanted to go swimming (but they have an outdoor pool….it was October).They let us use their sister hotel’s indoor pool, called the Angel Inn, which was not far away (both hotel’s staff were great about it and very accommodating). So the swimming worked out well. The lobby and breakfast area were very clean with nice furnishings and a computer for free use. Wireless in the room also worked fine. Check-in and Check-out was quick (but hotel was not crowded in Oct). It is not on the strip which is less convenient, but the hotel is still in a good area overall. This was an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Will Not Stay Here Again”
Reviews.Author: mandotsan
Reviews.Content: Room smelled like ther was mold in it, they claim to have Wi-Fi...could never get connected...even tho my Lap Top worked at the other two hotels we stayed at. One clerk was a racist, whenever we would tell her something was not done right with our room...soap, room make up etc...she always said "it's those foreigners who we have working here", The whole town for that matter was not worth the time and money we spent..we can say I guess, we done that and been there...thats about it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place Neg Reviews are WWWAAAAYYY OOOFFFF WE WIll Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: ontisma
Reviews.Content: We checked in 8/14 and out 8/19 our room was a NS King. They said it was smaller than the rest of the rooms per their website but was more than ample space for my husband and I. Room was always clean and we were right next to the pool where children were playing all day and into the night never heard them once. A/C worked great had to turn it up less than thirty minutes after turning it down. Burr!!!!!!! The price was excellent and being right off of the strip which made it all that more attractive this was the perfect place for us. Have to say the bad reviews on here are way off granted this is no 5 star resort but we didn't pay 5 star prices. Believe me I have traveled quite a bit and I'm not spending enough time in the room to scrutinize every little thing. The most important thing was a clean room, comfy bed, and good A/C so in my book we more than got our moneys worth. We never ate the continential breakfast so can't comment on it . The pool is clean a little old but most importantly clean! Front desk staff got us checked in and check out really quickly but I think this may have to do with me registering and paying for the room online in advance. Front desk staff and cleaning staff most of all do an excellent job very pleased with what we got for our money. We will be staying there again when we come back to Branson! There is on the same parking lot a ice cream place if you get a chance have the apple dumpling a'la mode it is awesome and they stay open till 11pm. Across the street at the Imax is a restaurant called McFarlaines great breakfast reasonable prices just get the buy one get one half off smaller portions for Branson but more than ample to fill you up.

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay here again, not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: AuntKena
Reviews.Content: We booked our room on line. When we checked in the lady helping us was friendly but kept talking to the other people she was working around. She had asked me to fill out our contact info and then kept asking me the same information instead of reading the paper in front of her. We finally got up to our room and it smelled like body odor. We actually had to go buy a candle to help cover up the odor. The soap dispenser in the room was completely empty and there was no other hand soap in the room. The first night we were down there we called the front desk for extra pillows and were told it may take up to an hour for her to even check to see if the had any and we never got any type of response back. When we went down to breakfast the next morning they were out of everything but dry cereal yet they had no spoons to eat it with and they even had a tip jar in the lobby. This was the worst hotel I have stayed at and I would not reccomend it to anyone. We paid $125 to stay here for 2 nights and I felt it was worth about half that. It seemed the only person doing their job here was the cleaning service. Even when we checked out we weren't asked how anything was and nothing was said to us besides asking for our room number we had to guess when he was done with the checkout. Don't waste your money here there are better hotels in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Bob2Tipton
Reviews.Content: I traveled with 5 other people. We reserved 3 rooms. All rooms very good for the price. Breakfast was excellent and is included with your room fees. I used the free WIFI by using a password given by the front desk. Had no trouble connecting. It was not on the main drag so traffic and noise was not a problem. The room we stayed in had a jetted tub. The rooms clean and supplied. Would definitely stay again. John Tipton, IN

Reviews.Title: “Some Good Some Bad”
Reviews.Author: Oktraveler33
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed four nights at the Amazinn. Over all I guess the good would out weigh the bad. The rooms were large, the beds very comfortable, clean (except the bathroom floor). It was very quiet, a nice flat parking lot, however our rooms were near the back of the property and it was a long way to the office and breakfast area. I couldn't walk that far but thankfully my husband could. I'm not sure why you would locate handicap rooms that far from the breakfast area. Another downside was there was no place in the bathroom to hang anything. Not even a hook on the back of the door. No place to lay anything, we kept our toiletries in our bag on the floor. With a little improvement, this would be a great place to stay. I would probably stay there again, but would speak to the front desk to see if changes had been made before I booked. Oklahomatraveler

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel for decent price and average service”
Reviews.Author: tahataka
Reviews.Content: My husband (43) and I (40) along with our two girls, who are 14 and 11, stayed in the Amazinn & Suites the end of June 09. Sorry for the long review, but I try to remember to put in all the things I’d like to know about. Booking: We pre-booked our room online through their website directly. If you book through their website and want to save a few dollars on the room…make sure to register online for their e-mail/newsletter thing prior to booking and you get a cheaper rate. We paid $252 for three nights. I have yet to get any e-mails from them…not that I particularly want any. Location: The location was on the red route. It is, as many others are, within a 5-10 minute drive of things to do. This route is definitely not as busy as the main strip of Hwy 76. The location was good. Check-in: The front desk was very friendly and helpful upon check in. The only thing was our reservation was under someone else’s first name and not mine….happily there was no problem with getting our room. Just weird where did that name came from? Room: We booked the family deluxe (first floor with microwave, mini-fridge, coffee pot and hairdryer), which has three beds but no sofa. The beds were some of the most comfortable beds we’ve stayed in. I’m sure it is due to the newer pillow-top mattresses that were had been told that were recently put in. The room was pretty clean. No obvious gross stuff such as mold, stained comforters, dust, or funky smell, etc. Thank goodness as cleanliness is tops at my hotel want list…not that I haven’t ended up staying in a crappy dirty hotel before. My daughter did however find some items like a baby doll bottle and cup, that weren’t ours, under our two beds when we were checking for items we may have left behind before checking out. TV and A/C worked fine. We did have a little trouble with the satellite clock but the front desk promptly switched it for us. We did require additional towels the last evening we were at the hotel. This turned out to be a small issue. I went to the desk and low and behold they had not an extra towel available. I was standing there with a dumb look on my face thinking how nasty it would be to use the towels we had just thrown in a heap, in the bathtub, to dry off with again in the morning!? Yuck! A light bulb went off in my head and I asked if we could get some from another empty room next to us. Well thankfully they obliged and I was allowed to get a key and go get towels from another empty room. I did this myself they did not offer to do it. So no over the top service…which, I guess, I didn’t mind, thinking of the clean towel I’d be able to use, was worth it! LOL Also, they allow pets. The room next to us had a barking dog. It barked everytime we'd walk by. I was thinking... oh jeez...we'll have to listen to that all night. Thank goodness the owners were either back in the evening or the walls were pretty thick as it's barking did not bother us at night. Pool/Hot tub: The day we checked it the hotel was extremely full and so was the pool. The pool is a nice size, but no frills. It appeared clean. I did not swim in it but our girls did daily. They said the pool temperature was a little warmer than a typical refreshing swim during the day, but still felt good…but said was wonderful in the evening after a day full of events. There was a hot tub and it was functioning properly during our stay. No lifeguard on duty…which is normal for hotels and it closed at 11pm, although I don’t believe they strictly enforce it. Laundry: The hotel has a self-laundry that has two washing machines and two dryers. They have no washing products to buy in the laundry room. You can buy a one-load powder tide or a 2 sheet per box dryer sheets from the front desk. No Clorox is available there. The products were $1 a box. My husband took me to Walgreens (5-10 min away) and we purchased a small bottle of soap and Clorox. This was much more economical for our multiple loads of laundry…two loads a day! Hey I have two girls! LOL Internet: I did not use the Internet but they had a computer in the lobby that could be used by adults over 18. It seemed to work fine as there seemed to be someone using it all the time. Continental Breakfast: Unfortunately, my dear husband is the only early bird. The three mornings he got there and ate before us girls got up he said the breakfast was just what other reviewers said. Just average. There was cereal, bagels, muffins, boiled eggs, biscuits, and gravy and fruit salad. Us girls managed to go to breakfast two mornings. The first morning we got there pretty late. The breakfast ends at 9:30. And when they say 9:30 they mean it. Things are being put away before that very time. At about 9:20, no fault to them, we walked in and there was hardly anything left to eat. No biscuits or anything but some eggs, cereal…but no milk, and maybe a couple muffins. So defiantly go at a decent time if you actually want to eat. The lady in charge of breakfast is just what other reviewers stated too. She seemed very put out to be wiping tables and when something ran out…well tough luck. She’d roll her eyes when people would ask if there was any more biscuits and gravy. She’d say that it would take twenty minutes to get some ready so they weren’t doing anymore. Some people were pretty upset with her. She told us that she couldn’t believe people were just so messy and she wouldn’t put up with it in her home! She scared me a little! LOL Could be she was having a bad couple of days. Either way, we made sure to hand wipe the table before we got up to leave! I guess the included continental breakfast is just that…very continental, very bland but also very free. Overall: It was a pretty clean hotel for a decent price. It was very comfortable. Front desk service was pretty good but the breakfast lady gave, I wouldn’t say poor service as kind of crabby service. We have been to Branson four times and stayed at Twelve Oaks Inn, Lynina Inn, Amazinn & Suites, and one other so long ago I don’t recall the name. I’m not sure if I would stay there again as we like to try out different locations, but would keep it in mind. Other info: This trip we also went to Hollywood Wax Museum, Titanic Museum, Go Kart tracks (Lumberjack & Wild-Woody), Silver Dollar City, Haygood’s Concert, Montana Mike Restaurant and Fall Creek Restaurant. If you want you can see my reviews on these. (some of these are in-progress if you don’t see them yet) I hope this was helpful as I always review tons before a trip. If you have any other questions I may be able to help with please e-mail me. Thanks and enjoy your trip!

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the price. Clean and quiet.”
Reviews.Author: Agility298
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel because of the reviews here... somewhere someone said it was better than the Comfort Inn. On the positive side, I had been very worried about noise, especially being so near another hotel and being on the first floor. I think it's the quietest place I ever stayed in, so that was a big plus. The room was very clean, and the pool area was very clean as well. The hot tub on the first night had some weird dirt clinging to the sides of it, but by the next morning it was cleaned. The hot tub did seem to be broken, air would only get out of one side. But it was under a roof, which was nice, and like I said, very clean the next day. (The pool water though, was much too warm, for a place with very hot weather. Not refreshing at all). The staff was very friendly. The free breakfast won't win any awards, but it's free. Bagels, biscuits with gravy, hard boiled eggs, cereals, juices, donuts, etc. A fruit salad that looked so-so. So not the best, but not the worst either. When we first checked in, the room smelled very bad. Not sure if it was a chemical they used for cleaning, or to cover up someone smoking (in a non smoking room). Couldn't really identify it, only that it was very unpleasant. We did not tell the front desk. By the next day it finally went away. We were on a tight budget, so this one of the hotels we found affordable and it was a good choice. I don't think I would stay there again, just because I'd like something a little nice, but I wouldn't tell people to avoid it either, it was fine.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: lunchl
Reviews.Content: We started out at the econolodge and moved to the AmazInn. The bed was wonderful and a much nicer motel than the econolodge. It was also $20.00 a nite cheaper. It was super clean and the people were very friendly. We are going back in November and plan to stay there with another couple. If you go to Branson give this motel a try you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: “Dishonest Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Southerngent31014
Reviews.Content: I booked this room for only one night just in case it was a terrible hotel. I'm glad I did. I'm a business man and internet in the room is extremely important. I checked the amenities of this hotel before I booked and free internet in each room was listed. I was unable to connect to the internet when I got to my room but I could connect to the hotel next door but their signal was very weak. I called the rude assistant at the front desk and she said the problem must be with my laptop because she was on the internet at that moment. I told her that I'd never had problems getting on at hotels and WiFi hotspots and besides I could pick up the hotel next door. She became more rude. I managed to stay online with the neighboring hotel's signal long enough to find another hotel in town with internet.
